member.name: M:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Html.Page.HtmlRendering.RenderHtmlPage(GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Extensibility.Layout.ILayoutPage,GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Html.Page.PageRenderingContext,System.Single@)
member.summary: Renders the specific page. If the extension is in single page mode it will open and close the HTML page in this method.
member.remarks: By opening and closing the html in this method, for single page layout, we could easily hook up single page rendering for multiple pages (if we need to).

member.param: a containing all the children 's for a report section.

member.summary: Event args for PageRendered event in streaming mode

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Html.Page.PageRenderedEventArgs.PageNumber
member.summary: Gets the page number

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Html.Page.PageRenderedEventArgs.IsLastInDocument
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the page is last in document

member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Html.Page.RenderMode
member.summary: Html rendering modes.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Html.Page.RenderMode.Galley
member.summary: The report will be rendered in HTML with one page header, one page footer (if they exist) and the report body will be rendered in one large section.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Html.Page.RenderMode.Paginated
member.summary: The report will be rendered in HTML with a page head and page footer for each page (if they exist) and the positions will be determined by the report's page height.
member.remarks: Pagination in the HtmlRenderingExtension has no width limit.

member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Html.Page.RenderingEngine
member.summary: Force rendering extension to use plain HTML or mix with SVG content.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Html.Page.RenderingEngine.Html
member.summary: Plain HTML/CSS output.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Html.Page.RenderingEngine.Mixed
member.summary: Mixed HTML/SVG output to improve look and feel.

member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Html.Page.HtmlSettings
member.summary: Settings for the Html rendering extension.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Html.Page.HtmlSettings.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Html.Page.HtmlSettings.#ctor(System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Html.Page.HtmlSettings.Mode
member.summary: Gets or sets the mode to use when rendering to html
member.value: A indicating the rendering mode to use.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Html.Page.HtmlSettings.LinkTarget
member.summary: Gets or set the target for hyperlinks contained inside the report.By default this value is not set.
member.remarks: You can target a window by specifying the window name, or specify to open the target in a new window by setting the value to _blank.
member.value: A string value representing the LinkTarget.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Html.Page.HtmlSettings.MhtOutput
member.summary: Gets or sets whether or not to output should be in Mht format.True indicates the output should be in Mht format; otherwise false. The default is false.
member.value: A boolean value indicating whether or not the output should be in Mht format.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Html.Page.HtmlSettings.Fragment
member.summary: Gets or sets whether or not the full html text will be return or just the contents contained inside the body tag.True indicates only the content inside the body tag will be return; otherwise false. The default is false.
member.value: A boolean value indicating whether or not to return the full html contents, or just the contents inside the body tag.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Html.Page.HtmlSettings.StyleStream
member.summary: Gets or sets whether or not the CSS style information will be contained inside the html file, or inside a different stream. True indicates the CSS style information will be contained in its own stream; otherwise false. The default is true.
member.value: A boolean value indicating whether or not to write the CSS style information to a different stream, or embed it in the html file.
member.remarks: When this value is set to False the full report will be rendered before being returned.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Html.Page.HtmlSettings.EmbedImages
member.summary: Gets or sets whether or not the images content will be contained inside the html file as Base64, or inside a different stream.
member.value: A boolean value indicating whether or not to write the images content to a different stream, or embed it in the html file.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Html.Page.HtmlSettings.OutputTOC
member.summary: Indicates whether the report's TOC(is exists) should be added in the output.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Html.Page.HtmlSettings.OutputChart
member.summary: Indicates whether the charts data (if exist) should be added in the output.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Html.Page.HtmlSettings.RenderingEngine
member.summary: Indicates whether we should use SVG internally or not.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Html.Page.HtmlSettings.IncludePageMargins
member.summary:
Account or not page margins for report rendering.
Can be used in Paginated mode only. Added for WebViewer and HTML5 viewer - for internal use only!

member.summary: First page

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Html.Page.PreviewSettings.WebViewer
member.summary: Gets or sets whether or not the is being accessed via the web viewer. If this is true, extra properties will be exposed in the settings NameValueCollection
